memberdef.name: EVENT_MAP_BEGIN2
memberdef.initializer: BOOL classname::_HandleEvent(SOUI::EventArgs *pEvt)\ { \ UINT uCode = pEvt->GetID(); \ UINT nCount = 0; \

memberdef.name: EVENT_MAP_END
memberdef.initializer: if(pEvt->bubbleUp) \ { \ BOOL bRet = __super::_HandleEvent(pEvt);\ nCount += bRet?1:0; \ } \ return nCount>0; \ } \

memberdef.name: CHAIN_EVENT_MAP
memberdef.initializer: if(pEvt->bubbleUp) \ {\ BOOL bRet = ChainClass::_HandleEvent(pEvt); \ nCount += bRet?1:0; \ if(bRet && !pEvt->bubbleUp) \ return TRUE; \ }

memberdef.name: CHAIN_EVENT_MAP_MEMBER
memberdef.initializer: if(pEvt->bubbleUp) \ {\ BOOL bRet = (theChainMember)._HandleEvent(pEvt); \ nCount += bRet?1:0; \ if(bRet && !pEvt->bubbleUp) \ return TRUE; \ }

memberdef.name: EVENT_CHECK_SENDER_ROOT
memberdef.initializer: { \ if(!pRoot) return FALSE;\ SOUI::SWindow *pWnd = SOUI::sobj_cast<SOUI::SWindow>(pEvt->sender);\ if(pWnd && pRoot != pWnd && !pWnd->IsDescendant(pRoot)) \ return FALSE; \ }

memberdef.name: EVENT_HANDLER
memberdef.initializer: if(cd == uCode) \ { \ nCount++; \ pEvt->bubbleUp = false; func(pEvt); \ if(!pEvt->bubbleUp) return TRUE; \ }

memberdef.name: EVENT_ID_HANDLER
memberdef.initializer: if(cd == uCode && id == pEvt->idFrom) \ { \ nCount++; \ pEvt->bubbleUp = false; func(pEvt); \ if(!pEvt->bubbleUp) return TRUE; \ }

memberdef.name: EVENT_ID_RANGE_HANDLER
memberdef.initializer: if(cd == uCode && idMin <= pEvt->idFrom && idMax >= pEvt->idFrom )\ { \ nCount++; \ pEvt->bubbleUp = false; func(pEvt); \ if(!pEvt->bubbleUp) return TRUE; \ }

memberdef.name: EVENT_NAME_HANDLER
memberdef.initializer: if(cd == uCode && pEvt->nameFrom!= NULL && wcscmp(pEvt->nameFrom,name)==0) \ { \ nCount++; \ pEvt->bubbleUp = false; func(pEvt); \ if(!pEvt->bubbleUp) return TRUE; \ }

memberdef.name: EVENT_COMMAND
memberdef.initializer: if (SOUI::EVT_CMD == uCode) \ { \ nCount++; \ pEvt->bubbleUp = false; func(pEvt); \ if(!pEvt->bubbleUp) return TRUE; \ } \

memberdef.name: EVENT_ID_COMMAND
memberdef.initializer: if (SOUI::EVT_CMD == uCode && id == pEvt->idFrom)\ { \ nCount++; \ pEvt->bubbleUp = false; func(); \ if(!pEvt->bubbleUp) return TRUE; \ } \

memberdef.name: EVENT_ID_COMMAND_RANGE
memberdef.initializer: if (SOUI::EVT_CMD == uCode && idMin <= pEvt->idFrom && idMax >= pEvt->idFrom ) \ { \ nCount++; \ pEvt->bubbleUp = false; func(pEvt->idFrom); \ if(!pEvt->bubbleUp) return TRUE; \ } \

memberdef.name: EVENT_NAME_COMMAND
memberdef.initializer: if (SOUI::EVT_CMD == uCode && pEvt->nameFrom!= NULL && wcscmp(pEvt->nameFrom,name)==0) \ { \ nCount++; \ pEvt->bubbleUp = false; func(); \ if(!pEvt->bubbleUp) return TRUE; \ } \

memberdef.name: EVENT_ID_CONTEXTMENU
memberdef.initializer: if (SOUI::EVT_CTXMENU == uCode && pEvt->idFrom==id) \ { \ nCount++; \ pEvt->bubbleUp = false; \ SOUI::EventCtxMenu* pEvtCtxMenu = (SOUI::EventCtxMenu*)pEvt; \ pEvtCtxMenu->bCancel=func(pEvtCtxMenu->pt); \ if(!pEvt->bubbleUp) return TRUE; \ } \
